sec.p: The antioxidant IC 50 values were determined in triplicate for the essential oils of R. chalepensis obtained from three different Palestinian regions. The results were expressed as means ± standard deviation (SD) and the obtained data were compared using ANOVA with multiple comparisons. All the data were considered statistically significant when the p value was <0.05. The statistical significance was represented as ∗ with p value < 0.05, ∗∗ with p value ≤ 0.001, and ∗ ∗∗ with p value ≤ 0.0001.
